[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-map-controls](./harp-map-controls.md) &gt; [MapControls](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrols.md) &gt; [rotateEnabled](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrols.rotateenabled.md)

## MapControls.rotateEnabled property

Set to `true` to enable rotation through this map control, `false` to disable rotation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rotateEnabled: boolean;
```
